name: Car Souls (cinetic)
description:
Tired of slowly fighting your way through the undead? Just run them over!

This game is a parody/tribute to the Souls series, with a new funny spin to the formula.

  • Explore the world as the Undriven
  • Race to beat the times of previous champions
  • Fight or run over multiple skeletons
  • Try to best the flying menace of the desert...

Built with Unreal Engine 4

---

V 1.0

If your Race times show as 00:00.00 please press "T" to reset them before starting the race
